titleStmt.title: Newes from Dennington Castle or a true copy of Major William Rives his letter, in vindication of himselfe and others. Wherein is related the condition of the leaguer before it, and the manner of the late sallie from the castle, with what losse was on both sides. Licensed and printed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Ryves, William, Major.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Twyford, at the signe of the three Daggers in Fleetstreet, neere the Temple.,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed on page 5: From the leaguer before Dennington the 26. of March, 1646. William Ryves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the three Daggers in Fleetstreet, neere the Temple.
